dialogueSegments.text: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>! Is that you? I finally opened my own restaurant!
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

dialogueSegments.text: That you did little guy. You’re all grown up now. Brewing your first coffee as well I see.
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

dialogueSegments.text: Yeah! Wanna try it? Your restaurant always had the best coffee.
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

dialogueSegments.text: If you insist, little guy. Let’s give this brew a shot.
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

dialogueSegments.text: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>! What is this? Did you even filter it?! I can still taste the crust!
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

dialogueSegments.text: Is that not how you brew coffee?
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

dialogueSegments.text: No, <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>. You have to tailor every order to the customer! No two customers are the same, you know.
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

dialogueSegments.text: I see! So I can’t just use the same technique every time?
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

dialogueSegments.text: That’s right <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>, you’re a quick learner! Now please, go out and try again! I’ll be waiting!
dialogueSegments.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

bestEnding.text: Here you go <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>, how I’d do?
bestEnding.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

bestEnding.text: Hmmm. Much better than last time <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>! But you’ve got a long way to go! Don’t get lazy.
bestEnding.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

bestEnding.text: Of course not! This cafe’ll be in tip-top shape next time you’re here.
bestEnding.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

bestEnding.text: Careful <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>, I’m gonna hold you to that standard! I’ve got to get back to work, but I’ll be back!
bestEnding.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

bestEnding.text: I’ll see you around <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>. Thanks again!
bestEnding.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

goodEnding.text: Here you go <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>. How’s this one?
goodEnding.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

goodEnding.text: It’s… passable I suppose. If you want the Seventino Midnight Cafe to be bustling with people, you’re gonna have to try a little harder <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>.
goodEnding.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

goodEnding.text: How do I do that? I’m trying my hardest already!
goodEnding.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

goodEnding.text: I know, little guy. You gotta make each coffee exactly how the customer likes it! Temper it to their expectations, and they’ll be coming back for more!
goodEnding.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

goodEnding.text: I see. So everyone is going to want their coffee a little differently?
goodEnding.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>

goodEnding.text: Exactly! Keep that attitude up and I’m sure you’ll succeed. Go ahead and give this one another shot! I know you can do it <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>!
goodEnding.speaker: <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>

goodEnding.text: There's no way I can give up now! Wait right there <color=#c21e56>Rose</color>, I'll be back!
goodEnding.speaker: <color=#0da0d9>Chef</color>
